title: Yuru Camp
overview: Shima Rin is a high school girl who enjoys solo camp. One day, she meets Kagamihara Nadeshiko who was lost. Rin helped Nadeshiko and provided food for her. After this incident, Nadeshiko became interested in camping and joined the camping club of her new school. Turns out Rin is also a student from the school. However, she is not good at hanging out with people and constantly refuses Nadeshiko's invitation to join the camping club.
